createTrade

public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createTrade(java.lang.String json)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
Creates a new trade given the new Trade information in JSON form.

Parameters:
json - - a String representing the JSON for a new Trade. This must include the user id of the Trade owner.
Returns:
HTTP Response ok with the newly created Trade data as a JSON object
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

update

public javax.ws.rs.core.Response update(java.lang.String json)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
Updates a previously created trade with the given information in the JSON parameter.

Parameters:
json - - a String of JSON spcifying the id of the Trade to modify, a list of integer ids for 'givingCards', and a list of integer ids for 'receivingCards'
Returns:
HTTP Response ok with the newly modified Tade information as a JSON object
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

delete

public javax.ws.rs.core.Response delete(int id)
Deletes a Trade with the given id

Parameters:
id - - int representing the id of the Trade to delete
Returns:
HTTP Response ok if the deletion is successful, or 404 if the Trade to delete cannot be found
